rows.label: qev041305_MSG0001
rows.name:
Oh, wicked cards. You stimulate my devoltanizing
desires. *fsssh*[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041305_MSG0002
rows.name:
Many Miralife Cards contain poisonous, loathsome
images. These stimulate the collector's urge in a
Zaruboggan such as myself.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041305_MSG0003
rows.name: *fsssh* Do you happen to possess a petramand card?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041305_MSG0004
rows.name: ...I see. In that case, there is little else to say. *fsssh*[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041305_MSG0005
rows.name:
Many Miralife Cards contain poisonous, loathsome
images. These stimulate the collector's urge in a
Zaruboggan such as myself.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041305_MSG0006
rows.name:
*fsssh* Do you happen to possess a petramand card?
And if so, would you trade it for a suid?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041305_MSG0007
rows.name:
Well, more specifically, would you trade it for the
BONES of a suid? I own no cards, you see.
But bones are quite nice. Pleasant heft to them. *fsssh*[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041305_MSG0008
rows.name:
Such a wicked card... I wish to devoltanize it this
very minute! *fsssh*[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041305_MSG0009
rows.name: Thank you. *fsssh* Here are the suid bones in return.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041305_MSG0010
rows.name:
I see. *fsssh* If you change your mind,
come and speak with me anytime.[ST:wait ]
